alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Potter; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 12:05AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LYCOMING...NORTHEASTERN POTTER...SULLIVAN AND TIOGA COUNTIES THROUGH 115 AM EDT... At 1205 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles east of Wellsville to 13 miles west of Wellsboro to near Jersey Shore. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Montoursville, Mansfield, Wellsboro, Morris, Elkland, Blossburg, Duboistown, Westfield, Lawrenceville, Gaines, Covington, Arnot, Millerton, Overton, Kettle Creek Gorge, Leonard Harrison State Park, Ralston, Trout Run and Lincoln Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lycoming; Potter; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Tioga
